result.execSummary:
The defendant Thomas Daniel Urbaniak was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Hate Crime], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Invoice forwarded to Accounts Payable in the amount of $500.00 To Behavioral Consultants Inc Dr Deborah Collins for services on 05-21,28-2015,06-25-2015.Copy in file.

Defendant Thomas Daniel Urbaniak in court with attorney Lynn Ellen Hackbarth.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Case calendared for return on doctor's report.  Parties reviewed report and there are no challenges.  Defense withdraws special plea.  Court adopts findings in report.  Court ordered the defendant to take his medications as prescribed.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 24.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 8, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Thomas Daniel Urbaniak in court with attorney Lynn Ellen Hackbarth.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Defense counsel informs the court that he believes that the defendant is not competent to proceed.   Defense entered a plea of guilty and not guilty by reason of mental disease or defect.  Court ordered Dr. Collins be appointed to examine the defendant for NGI and competency pursuant to Wisc. stats.  971.16 and 971.14(2).   Court ordered case adjourned for return on the doctor's report to Branch 24.
Filed, signed Order for Examination.  Due to the court's calendar and defense counsel's calendar, the matter had to be scheduled further out.  Defense counsel waives any time limits, if any.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for July 6, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Thomas Daniel Urbaniak in court with attorney Lynn Ellen Hackbarth.  Deann L Heard appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Parties requested an adjourned pretrial date.  Court ordered case adjourned for pretrial conference in Branch 24.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 4, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Thomas Daniel Urbaniak in court.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Additional statements by Joanne W. - defendant's sister.  The defendant is not Public Defender eligible.  The defendant requested the Court appoint counsel.  Court questioned the defendant as to his income/monthly expenses.  Court will appoint counsel.  Court ordered the defendant to repay the County at the rate of $50.00 per month at the conclusion of this case.  Court appoints attorney Lynn Hackbarth.  Court ordered case adjourned for pretrial conference in Branch 24.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 7, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for 03-05-2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Thomas Daniel Urbaniak in court.  Nathaniel E Adamson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
OCCR Tape#15-039

Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Protasiewicz, Branch 24.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel.  Defendant does not qualify for Public Defender representation.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Branch 24.
